meanings.definition: Disorganized or lacking focus in thought or behavior.
meanings.sent1: She felt scatterbrained during the exam and couldn't concentrate.
meanings.sent2: Her scatterbrained approach to work often led to missed deadlines.
meanings.sent3: His scatterbrained actions at the party caused quite a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The scatterbrained squirrel kept forgetting where it buried its nuts.
meanings.sent5: The scatterbrained student lost track of time and missed the bus.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a tendency to forget things or be easily distracted.
meanings.sent1: The scatterbrained professor often misplaced his notes.
meanings.sent2: She was so scatterbrained that she forgot her own birthday.
meanings.sent3: The scatterbrained chef accidentally added salt instead of sugar to the cake.
meanings.sent4: His scatterbrained behavior in class made it hard for him to follow instructions.
meanings.sent5: The scatterbrained traveler kept getting lost in the unfamiliar city.
